short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web-Linked Notes For Developers: Create and save notes and code snippets tied to specific websites for future reference.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DevInks is a Chrome extension that simplifies note-taking by associating your notes with specific webpages. It auto-loads notes when you revisit a page, helping you seamlessly capture and recall information tied to your browsing context. Notes support text, markdown, and code in a cell-based interface, with light and dark modes for customization.

All data is stored locally using IndexedDB for reliable offline access. Whether for work, study, or software development, DevInks enhances productivity by integrating note-taking directly into your browsing experience.
